00007 #include "AnalogTrigger.h"
00008 
00009 #include "AnalogChannel.h"
00010 #include "AnalogModule.h"
00011 #include "Resource.h"
00012 #include "Utility.h"
00013 #include "WPIStatus.h"
00014 
00015 static Resource *triggers = NULL;
00016 
00021 void AnalogTrigger::InitTrigger(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00022 {
00023     Resource::CreateResourceObject(&triggers, tAnalogTrigger::kNumSystems);
00024     m_channel = channel;
00025     m_analogModule = AnalogModule::GetInstance(slot);
00026     m_index = triggers->Allocate();
00027     m_trigger = new tAnalogTrigger(m_index, &status);
00028     m_trigger->writeSourceSelect_Channel(m_channel - 1, &status);
00029     m_trigger->writeSourceSelect_Module(AnalogModule::SlotToIndex(slot), &status);
00030     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00031 }
00032 
00037 AnalogTrigger::AnalogTrigger(UINT32 channel)
00038 {
00039     InitTrigger(GetDefaultAnalogModule(), channel);
00040 }
00041 
00045 AnalogTrigger::AnalogTrigger(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00046 {
00047     InitTrigger(slot, channel);
00048 }
00049 
00055 AnalogTrigger::AnalogTrigger(AnalogChannel *channel)
00056 {
00057     InitTrigger(channel->GetSlot(), channel->GetChannel());
00058 }
00059 
00060 AnalogTrigger::~AnalogTrigger()
00061 {
00062     triggers->Free(m_index);
00063     delete m_trigger;
00064 }
00065 
00071 void AnalogTrigger::SetLimitsRaw(INT32 lower, INT32 upper)
00072 {
00073     if (lower > upper)
00074     {
00075         wpi_fatal(AnalogTriggerLimitOrderError);
00076     }
00077     m_trigger->writeLowerLimit(lower, &status);
00078     m_trigger->writeUpperLimit(upper, &status);
00079     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00080 }
00081 
00086 void AnalogTrigger::SetLimitsVoltage(float lower, float upper)
00087 {
00088     if (lower > upper)
00089     {
00090         wpi_fatal(AnalogTriggerLimitOrderError);
00091     }
00092     // TODO: This depends on the averaged setting.  Only raw values will work as is.
00093     m_trigger->writeLowerLimit(m_analogModule->VoltsToValue(m_channel, lower), &status);
00094     m_trigger->writeUpperLimit(m_analogModule->VoltsToValue(m_channel, upper), &status);
00095     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00096 }
00097 
00103 void AnalogTrigger::SetAveraged(bool useAveragedValue)
00104 {
00105     wpi_assert(m_trigger->readSourceSelect_Filter(&status) == 0);
00106     m_trigger->writeSourceSelect_Averaged(useAveragedValue, &status);
00107     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00108 }
00109 
00115 void AnalogTrigger::SetFiltered(bool useFilteredValue)
00116 {
00117     wpi_assert(m_trigger->readSourceSelect_Averaged(&status) == 0);
00118     m_trigger->writeSourceSelect_Filter(useFilteredValue, &status);
00119     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00120 }
00121 
00127 UINT32 AnalogTrigger::GetIndex()
00128 {
00129     return m_index;
00130 }
00131 
00137 bool AnalogTrigger::GetInWindow()
00138 {
00139     return m_trigger->readOutput_InHysteresis(m_index, &status) != 0;
00140 }
00141 
00149 bool AnalogTrigger::GetTriggerState()
00150 {
00151     return m_trigger->readOutput_OverLimit(m_index, &status) != 0;
00152 }
00153 
00161 AnalogTriggerOutput *AnalogTrigger::CreateOutput(AnalogTriggerOutput::Type type)
00162 {
00163     return new AnalogTriggerOutput(this, type);
00164 }
